subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz hit a three-run homer, Jason Varitek homered and drove in four runs, and the sleep-deprived Red Sox beat host Toronto, 16-4, on Saturday.
snippet: David Ortiz hit a three-run homer, Jason Varitek homered and drove in four runs, and the sleep-deprived Red Sox beat host Toronto, 16-4, on Saturday.
